keyMoments.title: Little Oars Jr. Opens Path for Whitebeard Pirates
keyMoments.description: Little Oars Jr., an allied captain under Whitebeard's command, throws a Marine battleship and opens a critical pathway through Marineford Bay for the Whitebeard Pirates to advance toward the execution platform.
keyMoments.significance: Provides a crucial strategic advantage in the battle and demonstrates the loyalty of Whitebeard's allied crews.

keyMoments.title: Little Oars Jr. Leads Charge at Marineford
keyMoments.description: Little Oars Jr. and his crew participate in the battle at Marineford as an allied crew under Whitebeard's command, with Oars leading a desperate charge to save Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's loyalty to both Whitebeard and Ace, willing to risk everything in the battle.

affiliations.description: Little Oars Jr. Pirates serve as an allied crew under Whitebeard's command.
